reporter-output.line: STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'vertical' menu button to set the menu nav to vertical orientation.
STEP 3
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Content'.
STEP 4
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Add content'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Character Profile' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Media Gallery' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Person' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Post' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Add content'.
STEP 5
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'My Workbench'.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Create content'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Character Profile' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Media Gallery' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Person' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Post' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Scheduled'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Content' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'mpxMedia' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Scheduled'.
STEP 6
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'People'.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Permissions'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Roles' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Apply Permission Set' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Permissions'.
STEP 7
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Content'.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Add content'.
Click the level 3 menu link 'Post'.
Verify the text 'Create Post' is present on the page.
Verify the text 'Title' is present on the page.
STEP 1
Open url 'http://qa5.publisher7.com'.
Enter 'admin@publisher.nbcuni.com' in the 'Email Address' text box.
Enter 'pa55word' in the 'Password' text box.
Click the 'Login' button.
STEP 2
Click the 'Menu' link to show the navigation menu items.
Click the 'vertical' menu button to set the menu nav to vertical orientation.
STEP 3
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Content'.
STEP 4
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Add content'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Character Profile' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Media Gallery' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Person' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Post' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Add content'.
STEP 5
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'My Workbench'.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Create content'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Character Profile' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Media Gallery' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Person' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Post' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Scheduled'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Content' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'mpxMedia' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Scheduled'.
STEP 6
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'People'.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Permissions'.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Roles' is visible.
Verify that the level 3 menu link 'Apply Permission Set' is visible.
Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Permissions'.
STEP 7

Click the 'Expand' arrow for link 'Add content'.

Verify the text 'Title' is present on the page.
